Articles.Content:
1. So, today I was playing GTA VC, and I aquired meself a new rocket launcher and a helicopter, so I flew over to the military base and screamed "I SHALL FIGHT THE EVILS OF CONGRESS, THEY HAVE ALWAYS UNDERFUNDED NASA AND THEY WILL NEVEER MAKE THE MISTAKE AGIAN!". Then I opened fire.

2. Listening to Protectors of the Earth while bombarding Kerbin with debris is so awesome!

Feel Free to Post Your Own!
